Summary: IT WAS ROUND LIKE A BALL
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hamlin
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS SETTING IN MY DAD`S CAR TALKING TO MY SISTER I LOOKED UP AND THERE IT WAS I TOOK SAME PIC~S WITH MY PHONE THEY DID NOT COME OUT 2 GO I WISH I HAD MY GOOD CAMERA. IT DID NOT MOVE AT ALL. I HAS THIS GUY TO LOOK UP TO SEE IF HE SAW IT AND HE DID.I HAD TO LEAVE SO HOW LONG IT WAS THERE DON~T NO.
